name: Scyan Engineering Basic Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the basic ship hulls and fighter LPCs from the "Scyan Engineering College" school of design.

name: Scyan Engineering Advanced Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the advanced ship hulls and fighter LPCs from the "Scyan Engineering College" school of design.

name: Scyan Engineering Weapons Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the weapons from the "Scyan Engineering College" school of design.
